string.text: I should follow Trukhlyay to the rendezvous point.
I promised to tag along with Trukhlyay on a trip to the factory. He claims something strange is happening there.
I should reach the factory with the squad and find out what happened there.
Something strange is happening in the factory. I should examine the area.
A dangerous creature appeared in the factory. I need to deal with it.
Never in my days in the Zone have I experienced such a battle... Time to get my reward.
Looks like I screwed up again. The case didn't contain artifacts but ordinary stones! I don't know whether there's any point in going to the bandit leader now, but I don't see any other option.
Damn it. Trukhlyay was right about this Mongol bastard. I'll be staying in the Dark Valley for a bit, so I might as well think of something.
Trukhlyay offered me a job. Considering the current situation, refusing would be unwise.
Reach the stalker camp at the farmhouse

It seems there's another entrance to X-18 located somewhere in the vicinity of the Dark Valley. I have to track it down. The stalkers who have set up camp at the Dark Valley farmhouse might know more.
The stalker has some type of offer in mind. I should talk to him.
The stalkers won't talk to me until I bring them money. They demand 1,500 rubles.
Clumsy might have answers to my questions.
Go to the Fault anomaly for the artifact
Clumsy will tell me about the secret X-18 entrance if I get him an artifact.
What in the hell? As soon as I get close, the artifact relocates somewhere... I'll try pursuing it.
Seems the artifact is getting closer every time. Now's a good time to snatch it.
Someone or something really isn't letting me go alive.
Hot damn... What the hell was that, and how much time has passed? My head is splitting... Good thing the artifact doesn't seem to be moving anymore.
That was an interesting turn of events... If I tell anyone, they won't believe it. I should to take the artifact to the stalker.
Clumsy told me about the secret lab entrance. I'll need to scout the area first.
Trukhlyay urgently called me to camp. Something's up.
Trukhlyay asked me to grab some kind of narcotics from a scientist and hand him money in order to launch his plan to steal possessions from a stash in the bandit base.
Install the device in the anomaly
The scientist asked me to help set up a scanner in an anomaly.
The device is set up. Time to speak to the scientist.
Down to business! I need to go to the bandit base and slip the powder into the food located at the field kitchen.

The powder's slipped into the field kitchen. It should come into effect in a few hours, and we'll have cleaned out the Freedom stash. Right now, I should return to Trukhlyay and inform him about the mission.
Trukhlyay will give the command when help will be needed. Right now, I need to deal with the laboratory entrance.
Judging by everything, the operation is ready to commence. I should meet with Trukhlyay's group.
Time to grab the trader's case and find out what's inside the stash.
Trukhlyay ordered for the second laboratory entrance to be sealed off.
For now, the bandits are dealing with the entrance to the stash. I should find the trader's artifacts.
Time to return to the bandits. They must've already dealt with the entrance to the stash.
To get to the bandit base and grab Crutch's artifacts, I need to bring either ten antirads or 4000 rubles as payment for the toll. If push comes to shove, a radiation-extracting artifact will do.
A stalker called for help from a basement in the bandit base. Must be a bandit captive — a feeling I know all too well, those SOBs... I should find out how I can help him.
I need to wait for a moment when there'll be a chance to help Mute out of the prison. I'll have to work for the bastards if anything happens.
While I was gone, the bandits should already have fallen asleep from what I slipped in. In any case, I can only hope for it. I should free the stalker from his cell.
I should open the cell and free the stalker. The gate is opened by a control panel near the cell.
A strange stalker at the farm asked me to find an electric lantern and radio in the garage near the laboratory entrance. In return, he's promised me a generous reward.
Give Harpoon the lantern and radio
I have all the radio amateur's stuff. I need to bring it to him now.
Our radio operator will offer me a job after he sorts out his problems. I need to wait for him to message me.
Mug, one of the stalkers on the farm, sent an SOS signal. I should go there and find out what happened.
All the stalkers on the farm have been zombified; this is most likely Harpoon's doing. I need to put the stalkers out of their misery and decide what to do next.
I should comb the farm and find out what zombified the stalkers. I'm now sure that this is Harpoon's doing.
I was attacked by some sniper. I need to take him down to learn his identity.
The attacker is dead. I hope he's carrying some clues on why he set out to kill me.

Turns out that the mercenary Puma's PDA held a dialog with his contractor. Apparently, after the work was done, they were meant to meet at the gas station. I should go there and take up this problem with him personally.
I was unable to negotiate with Harpoon. All that's left are extreme measures.
Harpoon should be carrying some object that kept him safe from his own psy-emissions. I need to take it and destroy the emitter.
The job is done. I need to get rid of Harpoon's work so that no one else falls into his trap.
